comment.text: This key displays the term "AI agent" within various UI elements, including instructions in agent creation/editing dialogs, no-access containers for AI agents, and empty state views related to AI agents. It's used to clearly label and refer to AI agents within the application. Translators should ensure the translation accurately conveys the meaning of an automated, AI-powered entity.
